Hello there, hope this site is alive :-)

I downloaded the Silverlight DDD 2.0 and am trial-and-error'ing.

I am working on a web page (aspx), which has the feature to generate PDF reports and display them to the user. My goal with DDD is to add graphs to these reports.

This means that I won't have any screen to render to, I just want to construct a simple LineGraph and have it rendered to e.g. a bitmap, that I can include in the report.

Does anybody have a clue how to get started ?

Thanks a lot in advance,

Lars Klitgaard, Denmark
